blocks.content:
##### **The Teti Project is focused on improving conditions of the young women and girls of Kenya through various initiatives. Equipping young women with the necessary education to improve their futures and their own communities.**

##### **The name 'Teti' means 'community' for the Teti Project Team. Inspired by the women of Kenya and their perseverance we strive to place Kenyan communities at the center of our work. Creating better futures of women also creates a better future for Kenya.**

> Our goals include:
>
> 1. Improving sexual and reproductive health in rural communities.
> 2. Providing educational opportunities for young women and girls.
> 3. Destigmatizing conversations of health and hygeine in Kenya.
